lender.name: lifeofpatrick

lender.occupational_info: "If you read history you will find that the Christians who did most for the present world were precisely those who thought most of the next. It is since Christians have largely ceased to think of the other world that they have become so ineffective in this." - C. S. Lewis

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of women to uplift themselves and their families. I am blessed to live in the United States and have the opportunities that many women across the globe do not have. If I can help through small acts, then it is my honor.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization in the Silicon Valley that supports public education through grantmaking. Our current focus is on science, technology and engineering, but we also have programs in math and literacy. I process all of our grants, manage IT for the entire foundation and manage the office as well as do some financial work. Ultimately I plan to return to school to get my masters in international development and to pursue a NPO/NGO career focusing on African women's issues.

lender.name: Brad

lender.occupational_info:
I have started a few companies that leverage the internet to help businesses be more efficient.
My current company, DocuSign, Inc. (www.docusign.com) allows people to send documents for signature online from a PC so they do not need to print and transport paper. This eliminates postage fees, paper fees, and lets users get contracts signed in minutes, not days or weeks.

lender.occupational_info: Helping people buy and sell homes and providing information to help them make the best use of their homes while living there.

lender.occupational_info: I am a painter, printmaker, and performance artist. I am also a mother and grandmother.

lender.name: Lizbeth

lender.occupational_info: I work in a nursing home, helping older people stay comfortable and involved in life during their later years. I like to write short feature stories and poetry.

lender.name: dont_panyk
lender.loan_because: we have an obligation to share our ideas, our wealth and our commitment with others.
lender.occupational_info: living lightly upon the earth

lender.name: Susan

lender.name: Rutul
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of economics and hard work. I am a student of finance and an appreciator of ideas executed right. lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: If I can make a positive difference in someone else's life, why not? Kiva gives average people a chance to help each other and communicate good will.
lender.occupational_info: I have the honor of working with critically ill patients and their families in a hospital's intensive care unit.

lender.name: Jeffers and Triin

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: I like to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach part time and am a volunteer mentor.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I recently learned of the impact even $25 can make to a person's success. I do freelance marketing writing, one of my clients is Sarah's Hope Jewelry, who gives 10% of profits to fund microloans. As a mother and woman who owns her own business, I want to help other struggling moms out there. I want her children to see, and benefit from, a woman's success.
lender.occupational_info: After years in the corporate world, I quit my job to be a fulltime mommy. I have a job where I do marketing writing (brochures, catalogs, etc.) on the side to earn extra income and to challenge myself intellectually. It is empowering and important to be able to provide for yourself.

lender.name: Kala
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women entrepreneurs succeed in their businesses and become empowered and independent as they work to better their lives as well as the lives of their family members.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I've seen people with these kinds of businesses and needs in my travels and hated that I had no way to help - now I do.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I love start up businesses, Iâve started my own company 3 times so far. Kiva is a great way to support hard working people who have an entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I can make a direct impact in the quality of another person's life.

lender.name: Susanna

lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother and a wife: cooking, cleaning, dirty diapers, laundry, etc, all the usual!

lender.name: kelechi
lender.occupation: a little of this, a little of that

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I love what I do, but the truth is that I spend most of my days making overpriced food for extremely rich people. It satisfies my creative urge, but it doesn't feed my soul. I wanted to try to do something that actually matters to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I make fancy desserts..

lender.name: Linda

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people

lender.name: Lost

lender.name: ji unit

lender.name: Paras
lender.loan_because: Let's make some money!!! ...oh, wait a minute.

lender.name: Gayle

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Teach others to dance.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Every individual has the ability to be a positive change in the world!! I lend because I am blessed and want to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I spend half of my life working as a barista and the other half reading books and writing papers for school.

lender.name: hayden
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: people all over the globe have commonalities; we all want the best for our children, we all want a safe neighborhood, we all want to go to bed each night without hunger, we all need our families and friends around us, we all depend on each other to get by and we all try to live in integrity. The planet ,and everything we receive from it, belongs to all of us and ought to be shared.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate specialists such as carpenters, plumbers and electricians to repair and remodel buildings that are part of the local government such as fire and police stations and libraries.

lender.name: julie / stony

lender.name: Kindness Cures
lender.loan_because: I believe in basic goodness!
lender.occupational_info: I Create to inspire! Our products help to elevate awareness in the power of loving kindness!

lender.name: Cortney
lender.loan_because: PHILIPPIANS 2:3-4 "Don't be selfish; don't live to make a good impression on others. Be humble, thinking of others as better than yourself. Don't think only about your own affairs, but be interested in others, too, and what they are doing."
lender.occupational_info: I hire and train people, create policies, and help employees who work for a non-profit organization.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: It's something I can do to make a tangible change.

lender.name: Skye
lender.loan_because: The world thrives on compassion and inspiration.

lender.name: Peter & Darcy
lender.loan_because: Helping others in this manner improves lives and is a way of honoring God.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business that calibrates measuring instruments and controls, and measures coatings. Darcy is business manager for a brick sales company.

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: There is nothing greater than helping those who need the most, especially when able to see the impact it has in their lives. Just to see the change for the better in someone else's life makes every day worth living.
lender.occupational_info: 24/7 Non-stop challenging work immersed in lots of love and patience. I am a caregiver, negotiator, teacher, cook, chaufeur fully engaged in my daughters' lives. It can get stressful at times but definitely most rewarding job I've ever had.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I have visited 43 countries. Everywhere I go, I meet wonderful, hardworking people who are willing to work hard but need a hand getting started.
lender.occupational_info: Our non-profit organization helps leaders start new churches. I am directional leader of the organization.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: Itâs important to think and act globally. We have a responsibility to our brethren worldwide, and this is a great way to help those who are helping themselves.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: it' the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: Work at a weekly newspaper.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to help hardworking creative people get a chance to put their plans into action.
lender.occupational_info: I am also an enterpreneur.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: to help those in need.

lender.name: William
lender.occupation: Youth Conservation Corps at Fort Moultrie

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: People everywhere want to be productive. Lending is a way to give a helping hand up, rather than a hand out. A hand out is about me, a hand up is about them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a state water resources agency.

lender.name: lynn
lender.loan_because: As a woman in business I know how difficult it is. I would like to help other women in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a landscape contractor. I design gardens and plant them with my crew.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: I schedule planes for casinos in the Southern US.

lender.name: Tom & Cindy
lender.loan_because: After doing foster care for nine years and adopting two African/American boys, we want to do more for the world we live in. This is a great opportunity to help others who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Tom sells woodworking machinery and Cindy writes Inspirational fiction.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Im obedient to what we are all called to do - Love!

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: In honor of my cousin, Eric, who was a Kiva supporter.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: God has given me the ability to share His wealth with others.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: it might just help one person know someone cares.
lender.occupational_info: I work with young children ages 0 to 6 years old and their teachers in a small yet dedicated school district. Many of our families live in poverty and are immigrants.

lender.name: Jacques & Lisa
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with so much so that He can bless others through us.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I think support should be given to those who are willing and able to work, and who have goals for their businesses and lives.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for 31 years in the communications industry, selling equipment to large businesses. I am now retired and do some jewelry making and traveling.

lender.name: Sona
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. Kiva is a great way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Retired gift store owner and now an avid quilter.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.

lender.name: randy
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva listening to NPR radio, my favorite station. I first heard about microlending when the Nobel Peace Prize was awarded in 2006 to Mr. Yunus. I was amazed to learn of the micro-lending concept he started way back in 1976 in Bangledesh - and since then had made over 6 million loans. Kiva is a great way to be involved.
lender.occupational_info: As VP of sales for the ministry division of Thomas Nelson Publishers (the largest Christian book and Bible publisher) we help non-profit organizations develop product strategies for donor development and fundraising using our products.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to enable small business owners to be successful, because their success will benefit their communities, their family and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Aerospace engineer.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: i care.

lender.name: Sesh
lender.loan_because: family, friends and strangers have helped me in my life journey and in turn I lend a hand to others.
lender.occupational_info: I create videos and animation to help educate people.

lender.name: Alfredo
lender.loan_because: It helps to generate income permanently.
lender.occupational_info: I am a science teacher.

lender.name: Yolanda & Luit
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care, can ,feel compelled to and are blessed by God to do so.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I would like to share what I can with others. I believe in supporting the dreams of small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I keep financial records for small businesses. It is something I enjoy doing because I know it is helpful and it gives the business owner more time to run their business.

lender.name: Norm
lender.loan_because: I want people to have an opportunity to succeed in business.
lender.occupational_info: The ultimate mobile auto detailing for Pierce County. A fully equipped, powered mobile unit that is outfitted with everything needed to provide vehicles the finest professional detail available.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my daughters and others that small gestures can change lives.
lender.occupational_info: I save land.

lender.name: Sinisa Jurcic
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: industrial automation and control

lender.name: John McWhorter
lender.loan_because: Just tryin' to be the change I want to see.
lender.occupational_info: I try to fix what's broken and learn stuff along the way.

lender.name: Kelvin & Anastasia
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microloans. It seems to me that Kiva.org harnesses the collective power of many individuals to help one person help themselves, and, by extension, to help those around them.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help students from around the world improve their English so they can continue their education in an institution where English is the language of instruction.

lender.name: Caspar
lender.loan_because: I believe in promoting entrepreneurship to reduce poverty.

lender.name: Ben
lender.occupation: Australian Youth Representative to the UN

lender.name: Dave & Amy
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do and we are so rich in so many things "Love is all you need"
lender.occupational_info: musician and comedian

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I believe in you! GOOD LUCK!
lender.occupational_info: www.julia-t.com

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea. Help people to help themselves

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: As a family it helps us feel connected to the rest of the world. For us it is good to remember that where we are in the world is just a result of accidents of birth. When the refugee boats were being turned away off the coast of Australia a few years ago, I couldn't help thinking that we (with all our unique and special qualities) could have been sitting huddled on those boats if we had just been born somewhere else in the world (and if a few bad things had happened to us!). I want my children to realise that everyone is special and everyone deserves "a go" as we'd say in Australia. Have a go.
lender.occupational_info: We work for the Australian public service collecting statistics like the Census of Population and Housing.

lender.name: Xav
lender.loan_because: everyone should share.

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money for me can make a big difference to someone else

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I watched a programme on CNN and thought what a brilliant idea and so started loaning and then continued reinvesting the money.I want to help people who are prepared to help themselves. I would like to help to give them that chance. I think it is a 'hand up' not a 'hand out'.
lender.occupational_info: I previously worked in social housing and with the homeless. Now retired and living in Northern Cyprus

lender.name: Sterling
lender.loan_because: Some people need help to improve their lives. Ripping off their nation's assets, bombing them or supporting their often odious dictators as is the custom of the Land 'O Freedom Folks (America the Greatest) is just not enough.
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of the community of human beings.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I feel a need to help out those who haven't had the chances I have been given...
lender.occupational_info: I test the engines that go on planes.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the true, good, and right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I fly for the UN which makes me a nomad. I have no fixed home and work two months on location then have a month off. I spend a lot of my time off in Bali and South Africa.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people that are trying to help themselves. Our American dollars go so much farther in these countries.
lender.occupational_info: I had a career in the big city now I live in rural area and work part time occasionally doing inspections and taking photos for a residential appraisal company.

lender.name: pavitra
lender.loan_because: I can understand the necessity for seed fund or working capital an entreprenuer. I just did the channeling
lender.occupational_info: Business Consulting

lender.name: Neil, Linda & Family
lender.loan_because: We can and opportunities should be shared as widely as possible.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I understand the challenges of following your dreams and supporting a family. I am excited to help someone else follow their heart and realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who loves to paint Pugs and other dog breeds. I love to share my art with others and spread the joy that my pug, Emmitt, gives to me.

lender.name: The G'Ma & Pop Fund
lender.loan_because: When my grandfather died I missed his funeral because I was overseas, but in my travels I witnessed extreme poverty that changed my view of the world. When my Grandmother passed away a couple of years later and left me a small amount of money, I decided that lending that money to those in need is a fitting tribute. The memory of my grandparents lives on through these loans - adding to others' lives as they once added to mine and my family.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I feel this is the most effective way to create change. Most philanthropic groups (including the IMF and World Bank) adopt to much of a top down approach.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in Graduate school studying International Relations and I work at a development consulting firm.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: We should help others who are willing to work hard and improve their lives.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I have faith in people.
lender.occupational_info: I raise awareness and funds for a nonprofit emergency food provider

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunities I've been given in my life and would like to extend opportunities to others who may not have them otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a research lab in which we study cancer genetics in order to help people live healthier lives.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I like the cyclical nature of the loan stream and how many people can benefit from the same few hundred dollars.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a video editor on Documentary films.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Loans help the economy of a given region, where donations help undermine the economy and put hard working people (seen on this site) out of work as they cannot compete with free foreign goods.

lender.name: Lisa,Daniel,Jacob,Max
lender.loan_because: we want to assist another family with reaching their goals and achieving their dreams : )
lender.occupational_info: Lisa Marie: first, i'm Mom. i'm a student (psychology, social work, art, theater), and i'm a youth mentor for PeaceJam and ArtWorks! Art Club. Daniel: first, he's Dad. Art Teacher for 8th and 9th Grade. Artist and musician (band is Deep Fried Pickle Project), mentor and sponsor for PeaceJam and Artworks! Art Club. Jacob: Student...and oldest : ) he loves to go to summer camp, play with legos and xbox and hang with his cousin. loves to help others and enjoys wrestling and tae kwon do. Max: youngest...on his way to 6th grade. he loves acting and singing. loves legos, hanging with his cousin, and helping people. oh...he also loves summer camp!!

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I like to help others achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I help my customers get the products and answers to questions that they need to do their jobs well.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: economic self-betterment is the answer to poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I study the effects of farming on air quality.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus. I have also seen the benefit of one person helping another. If every person that "has" would help one person that "has not", the world would be a different place.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large bank developing computer programs.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: we are all connected in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people talk and connect with each other.

lender.name: Whitney-rose
lender.loan_because: Microloans are the gift that keeps giving. It honors and respects those in need by not giving them simply a hand out but instead giving them the opportunity to make the life they've dreamed about come true out of their own work. I am honored to help in this way. Check out http://www.povertyfighters.com it is one of those free click sites that also donates money for microloans
lender.occupational_info: I am currently finishing my education and will be teaching children soon. I don't know what age they will be though they will likely be between 5 and 10 years of age.

lender.name: Thao
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have some sense of well-being and hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a technology company and I find people to join our team.

lender.name: Wells Trust
lender.loan_because: Wells Trust supports entrepreneurs, farmers, artists, designers, and writers throughout the world, empowering the individual within the community.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people who want to be more of who they are.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to dissolve the gap between who you are being, and who you REALLY are.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I believe in individuals helping each other out. I have been the recipient of such wonderful support from local people when traveling in various countries around the world and this seemed to be a great way to begin to pay some of it back.
lender.occupational_info: I create software that helps insure that complex systems behave as designed.

lender.name: Anthony & Manon
lender.loan_because: Pay it Forward :-)

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: a motivated person trapped in a hopeless life can be driven to insane acts in a desperate attempt to change the system. The same person with a little hope may instead improve the system for us all.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I believe that projects like kiva are pivotal to increasing global understanding and communication, while they give people an opportunity to support each other.
lender.occupational_info: I direct and perform in a performing arts company that includes dance, acrobatics, aerial, and fire performance.

lender.name: berner
lender.loan_because: I feel like anything i do for others I do in the name of Christ and hope that with it I help plant the seed of my Father's love. Share your blessing with others as I have shared my own blessing with you.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I want to and can!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an esitmator for a regional construction company.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good thing to do. I hope it helps people see a kinder side of America.
lender.occupational_info: I write the words that appear on websites, packages and advertisements.

lender.name: Mary Anne
lender.loan_because: I am so very fortunate and I want to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It is an amazing chance to bring entrepreneurship to someone. There are so many great business people that might not have the chance to do what they want if it were not for MFI and social lending opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital verifying insurance and I find it very interesting how much people don't know about their own coverage or lack there of. I also work at a homeless shelter which has opened my eyes to the disadvantaged of my own society, since things are so expensive here, I feel that I can help more abroad. I am also into research and I am looking for correlations between words and market movements.

lender.name: Sarma
lender.loan_because: God has been kind to me in many ways. So, I want to see how this works and in the process help someone if I can.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze information needs from our business partners and provide technical solutions.

lender.name: Lee Zalben
lender.loan_because: My small business would never have succeeded without the support of others who had faith in me.
lender.occupational_info: Peanut Butter & Co. is an innovative manufacturer and marketer of all natural peanuts and peanut butter products.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: It makes my heart happy!
lender.occupational_info: I make peoples' lunches. But my main work is to make grouchy office people smile.

lender.name: Sean+
lender.occupation: Minister, library worker, waiter, ESL teacher
lender.loan_because: I tutor literacy and English as a Second Language, I sponsor a child in Indonesia, and this is another, a different way to help. Outright charity is appropriate in some situations; loans are better in others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a priest in the Celtic Catholic Church. That does not support me, so I also work in a library checking books out to patrons, and I serve food in a restaurant. I have a lot of respect for people who work really hard to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Bill and Capalene
lender.loan_because: We know it can make a significant difference in one person's life.
lender.occupational_info: Bill works for a major medical non-profit in fundraising; Capalene is a 6th grade language arts (english) teacher

lender.name: Janet and Les
lender.loan_because: Our parents taught us to work hard and you will be a success. Our loans help those in other countries reap the success they deserve - because they too work hard!
lender.occupational_info: We are retired and now travel fulltime in the U.S. in our RV. Les was employed by the oil and gas industry. Janet was a social worker.

lender.name: Micayla
lender.loan_because: Its the cool thing to do!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Society has created some problems in the world and people are solution, one person at a time. ( I want to be one of them)
lender.occupational_info: I am the co-founder of a non-profit called Pink Penguin Press www.pinkpenguinpress.org and a company called Ribbon Nutrition

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It is time to give back.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of giving my hard-earned money to a very specific cause, and to see the fruits of mine and my loanee's labor. The whole world is a community and this is such a great incentive to help from afar.
lender.occupational_info: I re-design the interior of buildings...a room here, a bathroom there, a kitchen over there, and make it all work together for function and beauty.

lender.name: Lyz
lender.loan_because: There is so much to be shared
lender.occupational_info: Former Kiva Fellow, now Kiva Fellows Program Intern at Kiva in San Francisco

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone should have the opportunity to succeed in life. If you have a good idea, its something you really believe in, and its going to be of benefit to you and your family; then you deserve the investment capital. Failure for lack of dedication is deserved, failure for lack of resources is a tragedy.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for a political party as an organizer. The specific area I work in is IT/ Software and I provide training and support.
Its a wonderful career!

lender.name: antti
lender.loan_because: It's Kivaa (means fun in Finnish)

lender.name: Maya & Bill
lender.loan_because: Kiva feels like another way to connect to people around the world and to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: Maya teaches theater and literature, makes theater, and writes. Bill does research and creates web resources for community development organizations.

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.loan_because: its fun to share
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their computers

lender.name: Anastasiya
lender.loan_because: I think it's a small way to make a small difference.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: Life is about helpin others!!!!

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I can! I've had people help me in the past and now is my turn to "pay-it-forward".
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Certified Public Accountant. I prepare financial statements and income tax returns for my clients.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: While traveling in India I spent 2 days in little villages meeting with women who were paying back loans to a mico-finance organization. I remember noticing the average loans were 5000 rupees and that was the cost of the sunglasses I was wearing that day...I strongly believe in empowering people with sustainable ways to support themselves rather than charity. I will never forget how appreciative these women were and how much of of a difference it had made to their lives.
lender.occupational_info: World of Arts

lender.name: Suzi
lender.loan_because: I think that Westerners have a moral obligation to support people in developing countries. Kiva gives me the opportunity to do that directly.

lender.name: Utari
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to taste success with maximum efforts and positive attitudes.

lender.name: Ilonna
lender.loan_because: I've spent a lifetime using my disposable income on only myself. I'd wanted to make a change but didn't find anything I really liked. When I saw the news program about micro-loans on CBS I said - "That's it... It's perfect."
lender.occupational_info: Finishing my Film Production Degree.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: One small gift can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a health care program in a large hospital.

lender.name: Julie
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical care to children.

lender.name: :Dan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: When I am not writing poetry, I maintain one of those very large government computer systems that have been around for many decades.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: it's actually fun.
lender.occupational_info: i design buildings. environments. spaces.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: micro-lending directly helps entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: worker bee

lender.name: Barry & Deb
lender.loan_because: As successful owners of several small businesses that we started from scratch, we were intrigued by the possibility of helping other Entrepreneurs in taking their first steps. We are glad to be a part of KIVA.ORG in this very innovative business model. Thanks!

lender.name: Lauren & Wade
lender.loan_because: it feels great to connect with people around the world

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: Just working on paying it forward...
lender.occupational_info: Mother Teresa of Calcutta: "The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread."

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help to create and maintain the tools that astronomers use to learn how our universe works.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: This is a sustainable way to create change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my time promoting and participating in collaborative teaching and learning . . . and doing lots of reader advisory.

lender.name: Saleh
lender.loan_because: I really hate giving away money. I would rather see it invested in the hands of individuals that are motivated and have a goal.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student who really cares yet is also a business man at heart.

lender.name: Clay, Jenni, & Erin
lender.loan_because: We were Peace Corps and VSO volunteers in Africa and want to continue to be involved with development projects.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: My blessings exceed my expectations and I want to share that with others
lender.occupational_info: As an accountant I keep track of my employer's money

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I breathe
lender.occupational_info: I work in Communication on large ships. I travel very much with my job.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am interested in supporting people in getting the start or boost they need to be more productive. Then, hopefully they will return the favor to others around them. Together, we *can* create a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with home schooling families.

lender.name: Brent
lender.occupational_info: I design and create social systems on the internet.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: All entrepreneurs deserve support and encouragement for taking initiative and for their courage.

lender.name: Mapuana
lender.occupation: Project Manager, wife and mother of 2 boys

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: It's easy

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Equality is achievable for all if those that have the means provide a hand to those in need.

lender.name: Carina
lender.loan_because: I am a human, fortunate enough to have been born into a life where I will never know the feeling of true poverty. I love my fellow humans, and I realize that many hard-working individuals do not seek charity; they simply lack the capitol to build a successful business, and a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a grad student at UMass Medical School, where I am pursuing my PhD in biochemistry.

lender.name: HÃ¥kan & Lena
lender.loan_because:
We feel the need to help other people, just like our parents helped us to a good education and a better life. To give and to help is one of the greatest pleasures in life.
We will make loans to the people of Tajikistan since we have a few friends from there and we know life is not so easy there.
lender.occupational_info: Our work is Interesting, exciting and international. It helps us broaden our horizons. We are meeting new interesting people all the time.

lender.name: Trish & Aaron
lender.occupation: Grad Students (both of us) ; A/V tech; PT retail
lender.loan_because: We recognize we are very fortunate to live where we live and have what we have. We would like to share with others in order to make someone else's quality of life that much better.
lender.occupational_info: As grad students we are both attending graduate schools to earn our Masters degrees. Aaron is studying Political Science & Trish is studying to be a Speech-Language Pathologist. Aaron is currently working full time as an audio-visual technician (he helps set up microphones, TVs, computer displays, etc. in various meetings of his company) and Trish works part-time at a sports store.

lender.name: Tomasnomas
lender.loan_because: I'ts a great idea to help people get started on something better.
lender.occupational_info: Trabajo con computadores.

lender.name: Savanna Halwas
lender.loan_because: This is a gift that keeps on giving.
lender.occupational_info: I help people file tax returns that let them keep as much of their hard earned income that they are legally entitled to.

lender.name: Andrew G
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do

lender.name: Matt and Meg
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Laura and Josephine
lender.loan_because: It doesn't always take much to make a world of difference. And we are fortunate enough to have a little extra to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work on groundwater policy issues

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make the world a better place for my daughter and son.
lender.occupational_info: I try to heal people and the world in the name of God.

lender.name: Mark & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Rather than just donating to charity, we think it is better to help people that want to make a life for themselves through their own efforts. These people are obviously trying to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: After working for a large company for 35 years and gaining a lot of different experience, I now help my customers by providing recommendations to help their business be more successful.

lender.name: Elan
lender.loan_because: these entrepreneurs work their butts off to make ends meet and need help, and this is the most sustainable way to do so.

lender.name: Skip & Cindy
lender.loan_because: So little can do so much...

lender.name: John & Tammy
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to be healthy, happy, hard-working Americans and want to share our good fortune with deserving people in less fortunate places.
lender.occupational_info: I give anesthesia and she is in business, and we are raising a family -- same stuff anywhere in the world.

lender.name: Peyton
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve water quality.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It is very rewarding to help others realize their dreams and make a better life not only for themselves and their families, but also for their communities that they live in and provide their services to.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Accounting

lender.name: Senthil
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of Kiva, and love that feeling of having helped someone someway
lender.occupational_info: I am in the IT services industry, and I also run a trust which attempts to provide financial support to Poor Students

lender.name: rikki
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: SOFUNN.COM
lender.occupation: Taking FUNN to the Next Level
lender.loan_because: We are business entrepreneurs that like to help people that take action to better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Most of us own and operate our own businesses.

lender.name: Adam & Priscilla
lender.loan_because: Priscilla and I traveled in the 3rd World and many extended kindness to us. This is a small repayment.
lender.occupational_info: Priscilla and I live and work in Northampton MA. I, Adam, as a Librarian and Priscilla in GIS. We are also beepers and will always lend to fellow beekeepers.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I think it's the most effective means of sustainable development and a wonderful opportunity to empower hardworking individuals who are dedicated to improving living standards for themselves and their families; hopefully they too will recognize their responsibility to pay it forward.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: Money is a liquid resource that benefits from moving, otherwise it stagnates. The secret of a healthy economy is not hoarding.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: Helping others is my nature and spirit.

lender.name: charlotte
lender.loan_because: it feels right

lender.name: Keenan Family
lender.loan_because: So our children can appreciate the impact they have on others

lender.name: Ana-Maria
lender.loan_because: our time on this Earth cannot be spent for ourselves alone.
lender.occupational_info: I study English Literature at University.

lender.name: Blu Ashton
lender.loan_because: I thoroughly believe in people helping themselves and getting a fair chance to do so.

lender.name: Zari Sussman
lender.loan_because: Helping someone to help themselves is the greatest good.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have chance to accomplish a dream
lender.occupational_info: I collect income and asset information from clients and put it together to present to a lender/bank to prove the clients ability to re-pay the loan they've requested to purchase a home.

lender.name: Jagular
lender.loan_because: I have known many people from very poor countries and I always hear their stories of poverty. I would like to do something to help people who want to come out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very large hospital in a big American city. I care for the sick and I like to see them become well again.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I need to give back some of what I have received. To give is to receive
lender.occupational_info: As a retired person I am on my churches social justice commission. I don't work I play.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I cook, manage a staff and run a meal preperation business.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: i can!
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that the people who work for my company are treated fairly and lawfully.

lender.name: Bill and Carrol
lender.loan_because: We enjoy assisting others.

lender.name: Curt Rosengren
lender.loan_because: It feels good. Simple as that. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I help people figure out how to put their passion to work to make a difference that inspires them, in a way that lets them thrive.

lender.name: John C. Kirkland
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make themselves successful
lender.occupational_info: John has handled billions of dollars in public offerings and private placements of debt and equity securities for leading investment banks, private equity firms and public companies. As a practicing securities attorney for more than 20 years, he was known for developing advanced public financing structures. As a Managing Director at long-only institutional investor Ironridge, he provides innovative financial solutions for small cap public companies.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make positive local changes.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently working at a National Estuarine Research Reserve in Mt. Vernon, Washington, USA. I teach kids and adults about estuaries: places where fresh water from the land meets salt water from the sea. Estuaries are important "nursery" habitats for many types of birds, fish and other animals, because they are shallow and protected and produce a huge amount of food! 2/3 of the world's estuaries have been developed, so it is important that we take good care of the ones that are still intact. I take people on field trips to the local beach and then explain how each of them can help protect estuaries and their local watershed. I will be working here until the end of August.
This September, I will be starting graduate school at the University of Washington in Forestry and Public Policy.

lender.name: Turner-Benvenutto Family
lender.loan_because: It's great to feel connected to people working hard to achieve their dreams. Kiva makes the world small. It's nice to help a neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: My wife home schools our 8 year old son. I am a business manager studying architecture. I'd like to build homes that are good for the environment (energy efficient) and healthy for the people who live in them (non-toxic). Much of my free time is spent as a volunteer fire fighter. We respond to structure fires, wild fires, river rescue, and vehicle accidents.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: If we believe in economic justice, we must be willing to give up some of our privilege and invest in the enfranchisement of many. In the words of Martin Luther King, Jr. : "No justice, no peace."
lender.occupational_info: Currently: Teaching reading and writing to children and adults; On the path to becoming a licensed doctor of Chinese medicine (herbs, acupuncture, nutrition). So excited about contributing to a healthier world! ;-)

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: $25 once, can continue to get re-loaned forever. How can you not do it?
lender.occupational_info: Safeguarding the public.

lender.name: Kreg
lender.loan_because: Humanity means we're all in this together.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We're are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a radiation physicist, interested in how to detect, identify and quantify radioactive materials.
